name: Private Eye (itch)
description:
Private Eye is an entry to the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. Walk the streets as a stealthy noir detective and avoid being spotted by hostiles.

Use WASD to move and J to jump. However, the theme of the jam is "Out of Control"... periodically lightning will strike and scramble your controls!

Unfortunately our developer ran out of time to finish implementing all of the features before the jam submission deadline, but please enjoy the ambience!
